segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is at the sink, towel around a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet's causing an overflow I didn't expect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is flooding out, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool by the open cabinet, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It wobbles as he reaches, which is nerve-wracking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, hand up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief adds a touch of sadness to the potential accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame if it ends in tears instead of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit down seeing the obliviousness here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe it'll all work out without harm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic scene has its charming side, despite the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy gets down safely soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
